alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 12:54PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Marion County through 145 PM EST... At 1254 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Ocala Airport, Dunnellon, Reddick, Lowell and Romeo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
